nodes.text: The Dles system contained Dles IV and was located within the Periphery.
The system was first centuries before the Battle of Yavin, but the explorers found nothing of value. No permanent routes were established.

During the Galactic Civil War, the Rebellion established several concealed routes to the system and built a penal colony on the planet of Dles IV. Throughout the star system several sensor beacons monitored any traffic.
